headline.main: RUSHES SERUM 8 MILES IN 12 MINUTES FOR BABY; Motorcycle Policeman Speeds to Save Life of Child Who Is Victim of Meningitis.

docs.abstract: Policeman rushes S miles in 12 mins with meningitis serum to save her life

docs.lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON. IT WAS exactly forty years ago last Tuesday, the day after his retirement from the office of Chief Justice of the United States was announced, that William Howard Taft came into the national public eye. On Feb. 4, 1890, he was appointed Solicitor General of the United States.
